description: This file is a shell script designed to monitor the NVRAM disk space, perform cleanup by deleting large log files, and schedule periodic checks via cron jobs. It includes functions for disk usage checking, file deletion, and cron management, with control flow to handle high disk usage scenarios.

methods.name: Timestamp
methods.description: Returns the current timestamp formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'.

methods.name: disk_size_check
methods.description: Checks the NVRAM partition usage against a threshold and logs if the space is critically low.

methods.name: deleteMaxFile
methods.description: Finds and deletes the largest file in the working path to free up space.

methods.name: scheduleCron
methods.description: Schedules a cron job to run the monitoring script periodically if not already scheduled.
